body.name: Avima Anti Colic Baby Bottles, BPA Free, Elephants, 9 oz. Wide Neck with Medium Flow Silicone Nipples, Blue(Pack of 3)

features: Anti Colic. Designed to reduce colic, gas, and spit up.
Only 4 pieces – Easy to Clean. Easy to Use. Seals Tight.
Soft silicone Patented (No. D954,280) Duo-Flo nipple for a secure latch and easy transition from mom's breast.
All Avima products are made to the highest safety standards and are free of BPA, PVC, phthalates and polycarbonate.
body.description: Designed to reduce colic, gas, and spit up. Our Anti-Colic bottles were designed to help your baby's feeding experience. The patented Duo-Flo nipples have valves that flex and adjust the flow of milk according to your baby’s feeding pace, so your baby can drink without interruption or nipple collapse. This minimizes the air going into your baby’s stomach which can reduce colic, gas and spit-up. 3 Pack of 9 oz. bottles with Stage 2 (medium flow) nipples. Only 4 pieces – Easy to Clean. Easy to Use. Seals Tight with No Leaks.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Safety Promise Our products are safe and durable. We are proud that all Avima products meet or exceed international safety standards. Designed to reduce colic, gas, and spit up. Our Anti-Colic bottles were designed to help your baby's feeding experience. The patented Duo-Flo nipples have valves that flex and adjust the flow of milk according to your baby’s feeding pace, so your baby can drink without interruption or nipple collapse. This minimizes the air going into your baby’s stomach which can reduce colic, gas and spit-up. 3 Pack of 9 oz. bottles with Stage 2 (medium flow) nipples. Only 4 pieces – Easy to Clean. Easy to Use. Seals Tight with No Leaks.

Natural Latch Our natural shape nipple closely mimics the feel of a breast to help ensure a secure latch. Multiple Flows Different flow rates are available so you can use the same bottle as your baby grows. Easy to Clean Only 4 Pieces – Easy to Assemble and Clean! Seals Tight with No Leaks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute cartoon design
reviews.reviewText: Each bottle is 270 mL and uses 10 mL increments on one side and 1 oz increments on the left side. The bottles are hard plastic and durable/won't crack even if dropped.There are 2 designs to the bottles. Two bigger giraffes (same pattern) on two bottles and the third bottle has a smaller giraffe. 1 giraffe per bottle.The cap is a cute star shape that also makes it easier to open/close. It seals tightly when closed and doesn't leak.Made in Thailand. Distributed in New York.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Anti COLIC BABY BOTTLES
reviews.reviewText: I love the pink giraffe on these bottle. They are super cute. The nipple of the bottle is supposed to be what makes them anti colic. I got these to gift at a future baby shower, but have concerns based on the fact that the flow rate seems to be very fast and there is no suggested age for the bottle. If I do end up giving them in the future I will make sure to tell the parents to check that the flow rate isn’t too fast for their little one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These baby bottles are so cute. They do have graduations on them up to 9oz or 270 mL so that you can tell how much liquid is in the bottle. The plastic is sturdy and cleans easily. The caps that go on the bottle nipples are also really handy for travel or for messy toddlers. These bottles are adorable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These look cute but definitely not anti colic. Sooo many bubbles while baby was eating. I tried to take out the nipple and put it back in, I make sure the lid was ok tight and it was really bad with 2 of the 3 bottles. 1 bottle worked fine and didn’t see as many bubbles while she was drinking her milk but the other 2 were so bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 3 anti-colic bottles with cute printing!
reviews.reviewText: There are 3 Avima anti-colic bottles in this order. They are good bottles. I ordered them for 6 months old, but the nipple is quite big for medium flow. I think it will take a while to adjust the flow with it. Nevertheless, this bottle works fine and the cute elephant pattern is just right for kids. Great value on these anti-colic bottles!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves these bottles the design is so cute and it looks just like the picture definitely worth the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Omg so cute
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are so cute the color is bright the animals adorable even the extra touch of the top being a star . I love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute designs but definitely not anti-colic
reviews.reviewText: These bottles do have a cute design on them and might be great for water or juice for older babies. BUT they are not ideal for colic babies. They allow too much air when baby is drinking and offered no help for colic. As I said they might work out ok for older babies and maybe as a back up bottle to be kept in a diaper bag but I would not recommend for every day use.
